sources.assets/sass/main.sass:
@use "dimens"
@use "colors"
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Bree+Serif&display=swap')

*
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box
    box-sizing: border-box

=colWidth($i)
    width: (($i * 100) * 100) / 1200+#{dimens.$percent}

body
    margin : 0
    background-image: linear-gradient(#c94b4b, #4b134f)

.container-fluid
    width: 100+#{dimens.$percent}
    display: flex

.center
    text-align: center

.container
    width: 100+#{dimens.$percent}
    max-width: 1200px
    padding-left: dimens.$gutter
    padding-right: dimens.$gutter
    display: flex
    
a, h3, h2
    font-family: 'Bree Serif', serif

a
    text-decoration: none

.add-project
    border-radius: 4px
    height: 30vh
    align-items: center
    justify-content: center
    display: flex
    padding: 1em
    background-color: #f0f0f0
    flex-direction: column
    opacity: .5
    &:hover
        opacity: 1
        cursor: pointer

.form-project
    border-radius: 4px
    align-items: stretch
    display: flex
    flex-direction: column
    color: white
    align-items: stretch
    textarea
        padding: 1em
        width: 100%
        height: 24vh
        resize: none
        border-radius: .5em
        box-decoration: none
    input
        margin: 1em 0
        padding: 1em
        width: 100%

.project-item
    border-radius: 4px
    height: 30vh
    align-items: flex-start
    justify-content: flex-start
    display: flex
    padding: 1em
    background-color: #f0f0f0
    flex-direction: column
    button
        background-color: colors.$primaryDarkColor
        border: none
        border-radius: 4px
        padding: .8em
        font-weight: bold
        align-self: end
        color: colors.$white
        opacity: .75
        &:hover
            opacity: 1
            cursor: pointer
    .title
        font-weight: 600
        font-family: 'Bree Serif', serif
    .description
        height: 10vh
        overflow: auto

#main
    background-image: url("../img/kanban.svg")
    background-repeat: no-repeat
    background-size: auto 40vh
    flex-direction: column
    background-position: right bottom
    overflow: auto
    height: 100vh    
    .navbar
        padding: 0 2em
        display: flex
        justify-content: space-between
        align-items: center
        color: colors.$white
        .logo
            display: flex
            flex-direction: row
            img
                width: 6em
                height: auto
                padding: 1em
        a
            text-decoration: none
            font-weight: 500
            font-size: 1.2em
            color: colors.$white
    h2
        text-align: center
        color: colors.$white
    h3
        text-align: center

#project
    .project-list
        display: flex
        justify-content: center
        padding: 2em
        overflow: auto

.row
    margin-left: -#{dimens.$gutter}
    margin-right: -#{dimens.$gutter}
    display: flex


[class^="col-"]
    position: relative
    float: left
  

#kanban
    display: flex
    height: 100vh
    overflow: hidden
    flex-direction: column
    padding: 0 .75em
    .board
        max-height: 82vh
        min-height: 20vh
        margin: .2em
        background: colors.$secondaryColor
        border: .15em solid black
        display: flex
        justify-content: flex-start
        flex-direction: column
        overflow: auto
        h3
            text-align: center
            padding: .5em 0
            background-color: colors.$white
        .task-container
            margin: .2em 0
            .task
                padding: .5em
                display: flex
                flex-direction: column
                background-color: colors.$white
                border: .1em solid #000
                border-radius: .5em
                textarea
                    padding: .5em
                    border-radius: .4em
                    border: 1px solid #ddd
                    background-color: colors.$white
                    font-size: 1.2em
                    box-decoration: none
                    resize: none
                    color: colors.$primaryTextColor
                .action
                    display: flex
                    justify-content: flex-end
                    align-items: center
                    padding: 0.2em
                    a
                        margin: 0 .5em

.project-name
    width: 100vw
    height: 15vh
    color: colors.$white
    text-align: center
    display: flex
    justify-content: space-evenly
    align-items: center
    a
        color: white


.add-task
    text-align: center
    padding: 1em

#auth-page
    display: flex
    overflow: hidden
    padding: 0 4em
    flex-direction: column
    background-image: url("../img/kanban.svg")
    background-size: 50vw
    background-position: left center
    background-repeat: no-repeat
    #login
        display: flex
        flex-direction: column
        justify-content: center
        align-items: stretch
        height: 100vh
        .btn
            background-color: black
            font-weight: bold
            letter-spacing: .2em
            color: colors.$white
            opacity: .75
            box-decoration: none
            &:hover
                opacity: 1
        input
            padding: 1em 2em
            margin: .5em 0
            box-decoration: none
            border: none
            background-color: #ddd
            border-radius: 2em
.btn-project
    background-color: black
    font-weight: bold
    color: colors.$white
    opacity: .75
    padding: .5em
    border-radius: .2em
    box-decoration: none
    &:hover
        opacity: 1
        cursor: pointer

.btn-add-project
    background-color: black
    font-weight: bold
    letter-spacing: .2em
    color: colors.$white
    opacity: .75
    border-radius: .5em
    box-decoration: none
    &:hover
        opacity: 1
        cursor: pointer

.close
    color: white

.top-form-add-project
    display: flex
    justify-content: space-between
    align-items: center
    span
        font-weight: bold
        font-family: 'Bree Serif', serif
        font-size: 1.2em

@media (min-width: 240px)
    @for $i from 1 through 12
        .#{dimens.$col-xs}-#{$i}
            +colWidth($i)
            padding-left: dimens.$gutter
            padding-right: dimens.$gutter
  
@media (min-width: 768px)
    @for $i from 1 through 12
        .#{dimens.$col-sm}-#{$i}
            +colWidth($i)
            padding-left: dimens.$gutter
            padding-right: dimens.$gutter
  
@media (min-width: 992px)
    @for $i from 1 through 12
        .#{dimens.$col-md}-#{$i}
            +colWidth($i)
            padding-left: dimens.$gutter
            padding-right: dimens.$gutter
